mapper.select: select show_no, show_name, show_category, show_content from show where show_no=#{show_no}

select show.*, showcomment.*, (select count(*) from showcomment sc where sc.show_no= show.show_no) show_commentcnt from show left outer join showcomment on show.show_no = showcomment.show_no order by showcomment.sc_date desc
select show_no, show_name, show_category, show_content, member_id, show_file, show_readcount from showcomment where show_no=#{show_no}
mapper.insert: insert into show (show_no , show_name, show_category, member_id, show_file, show_content , show_readcount) values ( (select nvl(max(SHOW_NO),0)+1 from show) , #{show_name}, #{show_category}, #{member_id}, #{show_file}, #{show_content} , DEFAULT )
mapper.update: update show set show_readcount = show_readcount + 1 where member_id = #{member_id}
